name: LoveLive! Kotori Minami 南小鸟 南琴梨 Anime Lora
description:
Minami Kotori from Lovelive Superstar!

使用这个链接免费生成图片：LoveLive! 南小鸟 南琴梨 - v1 | 吐司 Tusi.Art

Works well at around 0.8 weight on Anything V4.5.

Trigger is minami kotori.

As loveliver, my plan was to make loras of all lovelive superstars. I will gradually release these models.

If you are interested, please follow me.

It takes a lot of time and money to train models.

If you are satisfied with my job, please share your beautiful art and images.

I will be very happy to see these images!
